nl.inl.blacklab.search

Class BlackLabEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.BlackLabEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class BlackLabEngine
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Main BlackLab instance, from which indexes can be opened. If you don't instantiate this, but call BlackLab.openIndex() directly, an implicit instance will be created that will be closed when you close the last index. Instantiating this explicitly has the advantage of being able to pass parameters, such as the number of search thread you want (default 4).

        Parameters:
        indexDir - the index directory
        createNewIndex - if true, create a new index even if one existed there

        index writer
        Throws:
        ErrorOpeningIndex - if the index couldn't be opened
